Consider this as a bug report, the Redo button switches off 
the "Color" ch=
eckbox. 

--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, "Kenneth Stanley" <kstanley@...> wro=
te:
>
> We've been working for a long time on adding color to Picbreeder
> =
(http://picbreeder.org).  As some of you know from experience,
> evolving b=
lack and white pictures with CPPN-like representations is
> fairly straight=
forward, but adding color is a major challenge.  
Thanks
> in large part to=
 Nick Beato, who did the actual implementation on 
the
> applet after many =
group discussions, we now have an intuitive and 
fun
> color evolution syst=
em that actually works.  An important aspect of
> our color system for the =
continuity of the site is that it allows 
you
> begin with one of the preex=
isting black and white images (if you 
want)
> and it will evolve color int=
o it seamlessly.  So all the existing
> images can now be colorized!
> 
> W=
e've just begun to start publishing some color images, which you 
can
> see=
 under our Newest Images category:
> 
> http://picbreeder.org/imagedisplay.=
php?type=3DCREATED&page=3D0
> 
> By the way, in case you did not know, Picb=
reeder also allows 
anonymous
> publishing, so you don't need an account to=
 play with and even 
publish
> color pictures.
> 
> ken
